H0.text: what did george orwell died of. Pneumonia

H1.text: what did george orwell died of. Lung Cancer

H2.text: what did george orwell died of. Emphysema

H3.text: what did george orwell died of. Tuberculosis

A4.text: At the age of 46, Orwell suffered a pulmonary artery rupture due to complications of tuberculosis, and died in the early morning of 21 January 1950.
